```{r}

library(quantmod)
library(tidyquant)
library(RTL)
library(tidyverse)


treasury_symbols <- c(
  "1-Month"  = "DGS1MO",
  "3-Month"  = "DGS3MO",
  "6-Month"  = "DGS6MO",
  "1-Year"   = "DGS1",
  "2-Year"   = "DGS2",
  "3-Year"   = "DGS3",
  "5-Year"   = "DGS5",
  "7-Year"   = "DGS7",
  "10-Year"  = "DGS10",
  "20-Year"  = "DGS20",
  "30-Year"  = "DGS30")




tester <- tidyquant::tq_get(treasury_symbols[1],
                  get = "economic.data",
                  from = "2026-01-01")


tester$price %>% tail(1)


```
